languages.text: "Я собрал всех, кто смог откликнуться на вокс-призыв и кто способен держать оружие в руках... но я не вижу Лорд-капитана и ее архмилитанта. Сообщения с ее голосом продолжают поступать в эфир, однако она не откликается на прямые запросы. Последний раз я видел Леди Теодору на смотровой — когда вы расстались с ней?"

traits.locale_text: "Я собрал всех, кто смог откликнуться на вокс-призыв и кто способен держать оружие в руках... но я не вижу Лорд-капитана и ее архмилитанта. Сообщения с ее голосом продолжают поступать в эфир, однако она не откликается на прямые запросы. Последний раз я видел Леди Теодору на смотровой — когда вы расстались с ней?"

languages.text: "I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"
languages.original_text: "Я собрал всех, кто смог откликнуться на вокс-призыв и кто способен держать оружие в руках... но я не вижу Лорд-капитана и ее архмилитанта. Сообщения с ее голосом продолжают поступать в эфир, однако она не откликается на прямые запросы. Последний раз я видел Леди Теодору на смотровой — когда вы расстались с ней?"

traits.locale_text: "I have gathered everyone who could answer the vox-call and hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

"I have gathered everyone who could answer the vox-call and hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

"I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

"I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

"I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

languages.text: “我已经召集了所有还能拿得起武器的人……但我并没有看到舰长大人，也没有看到她的首席战士。我们依然在接收着她的音阵信息，但她却并没有回应我们的直接请求。我最后一次见到西奥多拉夫人是在观景台上，你和她是什么时候分开的？”
languages.original_text: "I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

traits.locale_text: “我已经召集了所有还能拿得起武器的人……但我并没有看到舰长大人，也没有看到她的首席战士。我们依然在接收着她的音阵信息，但她却并没有回应我们的直接请求。我最后一次见到西奥多拉夫人是在观景台上，你和她是什么时候分开的？”

languages.text: «He reunido a todos los que han respondido a la llamada del voco y son capaces de sostener un arma... y, sin embargo, ni la Lord Capitán ni su Archimilitante se encuentran entre nosotros. Aún recibimos mensajes con su voz, pero no responde a las llamadas directas. La última vez que vi a lady Theodora fue en la plataforma de observación; ¿dónde se separó de usted?».
languages.original_text: "I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

traits.locale_text: «He reunido a todos los que han respondido a la llamada del voco y son capaces de sostener un arma... y, sin embargo, ni la Lord Capitán ni su Archimilitante se encuentran entre nosotros. Aún recibimos mensajes con su voz, pero no responde a las llamadas directas. La última vez que vi a lady Theodora fue en la plataforma de observación; ¿dónde se separó de usted?».

languages.text: 「私はヴォクスコールの呼びかけに答え、武器を持つことができる者を全て招集した。なのに、私たちの中にロード・キャプテンも彼女のアーク・ミリタントの姿も見えない。今でも彼女の声でメッセージを受け取り続けているが、彼女は直接の要請には応答しない。最後にシオドーラ様を見たのは展望台だった。あなたは彼女といつ別れたのか？」
languages.original_text: "I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

traits.locale_text: 「私はヴォクスコールの呼びかけに答え、武器を持つことができる者全てを集めました…それなのに、私たちの中にロード・キャプテンも彼女のアーク・ミリタントの姿も見えません。今でも彼女の声でメッセージを受け取り続けていますが、彼女は直接の要請には応答しない。最後にレディ・テオドラを見たのは展望台でした。あなたと彼女はいつ別れたのですか？」
「私はヴォクスコールの呼びかけに答え、武器を持つことができる者を全て招集した。なのに、私たちの中にロード・キャプテンも彼女のアーク・ミリタントの姿も見えない。今でも彼女の声でメッセージを受け取り続けているが、彼女は直接の要請には応答しない。最後にシオドーラ様を見たのは展望台だった。あなたは彼女といつ別れたのか？」

languages.text: « J'ai réuni tous ceux qui ont répondu au message-vox et qui sont capables de tenir une arme... Pourtant, je ne vois ni la seigneure-capitaine ni son archimilitant parmi nous. Nous continuons à recevoir des transmissions de sa part, mais elle ne répond pas aux demandes directes. La dernière fois que j'ai vu dame Théodora, c'était sur la plateforme d'observation. Où l'avez-vous laissée ? »
languages.original_text: "I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai réuni tous ceux qui ont répondu au message-vox et qui sont capables de tenir une arme... Pourtant, je ne vois ni la seigneure-capitaine ni son archimilitant parmi nous. Nous continuons à recevoir des transmissions de sa part, mais elle ne répond pas aux demandes directes. La dernière fois que j'ai vu dame Théodora, c'était sur la plateforme d'observation. Où l'avez-vous laissée ? »

languages.text: "Ich habe alle versammelt, die auf den Vox-Ruf reagiert haben und eine Waffe halten können ... aber ich sehe den Lord Captain oder ihren Erzmilitant nicht in unserer Mitte. Wir empfangen nach wie vor Nachrichten in ihrer Stimme, aber auf direkte Anfragen reagiert sie nicht. Ich habe Lady Theodora zuletzt auf der Aussichtsplattform gesehen – wann habt Ihr und sie Euch getrennt?"
languages.original_text: "I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe alle versammelt, die auf den Vox-Ruf reagiert haben und eine Waffe halten können ... aber ich sehe den Lord Captain oder ihren Erzmilitant nicht in unserer Mitte. Wir empfangen nach wie vor Nachrichten in ihrer Stimme, aber auf direkte Anfragen reagiert sie nicht. Ich habe Lady Theodora zuletzt auf der Aussichtsplattform gesehen – wann habt Ihr und sie Euch getrennt?"

languages.text: "Voks çağrısına cevap veren ve eli silah tutan herkesi topladım lakin aramızda ne Lord Kaptan'ı ne de Başmilitan'ın görüyorum. Hâlâ onun sesiyle mesajlar alıyoruz ama doğrudan taleplerimize yanıt vermiyor. Leydi Theodora'yı en son gözlem platformunda gördüm. Yollarınız ne zaman ayrıldı?"
languages.original_text: "I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"

traits.locale_text: "Voks çağrısına cevap veren ve eli silah tutan herkesi topladım lakin aramızda ne Lord Kaptan'ı ne de Başmilitan'ın görüyorum. Hâlâ onun sesiyle mesajlar alıyoruz ama doğrudan taleplerimize yanıt vermiyor. Leydi Theodora'yı en son gözlem platformunda gördüm. Yollarınız ne zaman ayrıldı?"

languages.original_text: "I have gathered everyone who answered the vox-call and was able to hold a weapon... yet I do not see the Lord Captain or her Arch-Militant in our midst. We are still receiving messages in her voice, but she is not responding to direct requests. I last saw Lady Theodora on the observation platform — when did you and she part ways?"
